alert.note: Alert for Logan; Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 02 at 6:10PM CDT until May 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Logan County in western Arkansas... Northwestern Scott County in western Arkansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 609 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Mansfield, or 13 miles northwest of Waldron, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Booneville... Mansfield... Magazine... Echo... Barber... Lucas... Sugar Grove... Carolan... Grayson... Glendale in Logan County... Ione... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: Motorists should not take shelter under highway overpasses. If you cannot safely drive away from the tornado, as a last resort, either park your vehicle and stay put, or abandon your vehicle and lie down in a low lying area and protect yourself from flying debris.
